```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
```


```{r}

# Create a scatter plot of diamond price vs. carat, colored by cut
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) + # Add points with some transparency
  labs(title = "Diamond Price vs. Carat by Cut",
       x = "Carat",
       y = "Price (USD)",
       color = "Cut Quality") + # Add informative labels
  theme_minimal() + # Apply a clean, minimal theme
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") # Use a colorblind-friendly palette

```
